@NonNullByDefault

Package de.larssh.election.germany.schleswigholstein.local.file

Dateiformate für die Wahlen der Vertretungen der Gemeinden und der Kreise in Schleswig-Holstein gem.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AwgWebsiteFiles
    This class contains helper methods to write a result file for the AWG website.
    MetricsFiles
    This class contains helper methods to write an Excel spreadsheet (XLSX) with metrics of an election result.
    PollingStationResultFiles
    This class contains helper methods to read and write the polling station's result file format.
    PresentationFiles
    This class contains helper methods to write a result file for live presentations.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PollingStationResultFileLineParseException
    Thrown to indicate an errors while parsing PollingStationResultFiles; includes line information.
    PollingStationResultFileParseException
    Thrown to indicate one or more errors while parsing PollingStationResultFiles.

Package de.larssh.election.germany.schleswigholstein.local.file Description

Dateiformate für die Wahlen der Vertretungen der Gemeinden und der Kreise in Schleswig-Holstein gem. Gemeinde- und Kreiswahlgesetz (GKWG)
